name: SEND SMS in Pakistan
author: HAT INC

sections.description:
Extend your WooCommerce store capabilities and create new opportunities for your business with SEND SMS in Pakistan – Order Notifications for WooCommerce.

The WooCommerce Order SMS Notification plugin for WordPress is very useful, when you want to get notified via SMS after placing an order. Buyer and seller both can get SMS notification after an order is placed. SMS notification options can be customized in the admin panel very easily.

PS: This plugin requires an account(paid/demo) with www.hatinco.com service to send SMS. Demo account comes with some free credits to let you test it out.

Improve Customer Relationship
* Make your customers happy and notify them about order status change via SMS notifications. Every SMS Notification can be customized very easily from admin panel even in your Native Language.

Shipment Notification
* Send courier consignment / tracking number with complete details to customer for tracking.

Personalized Messaging
* SEND SMS in Pakistan is capable to personalized all kind of messages with WooCommerce available variables including Customer Name, Address, Email, Order Amount which can easily added in the message body.

WooCommerce Order Verification – OTP
* No need to call and verify customer’s order with SEND SMS in Pakistan you can automate the order and customer verification by using our OTP feature which automatically generate a PIN code and send it to customer’s mobile number to enter on the order verification screen. You can also enable the one-click order verification link feature so your customer can verify order on a click!

One Click Setup
* You can easily setup the messaging service by entering your UserID and API Key. You can generate a API Key in our Developer Documentation section.

Automatic installation

  1. Login to your WordPress Admin Panel. Search for SEND SMS in Pakistan through Plugins > Add New interface.
  2. Find the plugin box of ### Automatic instal and click on the Install Now button.
  3. Then activate the SEND SMS in Pakistan plugin.
  4. You will see SEND SMS in Pakistan in Setting Menu on Left , Click on it. Plugin default page is configuration of SMS. Enter your User ID and API Key which you can easily generate by logging into SMS Portal.
  5. All Done! Still have any question? Write us at info@hatinco.com or WhatsApp at 923322982223 – Happy to Answer!
  6. Our Privacy Policy is mentioned in detail Here Privacy Policy

short_description: SEND SMS in Pakistan - WooCommerce plugin will allow you to send Branded or Short Code SMS notification automatically for orders placed in WooCommerce …
